resources.string: There\'s no GPS on this device
Android limits the network activity while screen is off. In order to send the updated more than once in 15 minutes you need to disable battery optimization for this application.
WayToday allows anybody who knows your ID to see the last 500 locations on the site https://way.today for 2 weeks or until the ID changed
is running in the background. Battery optimization is on. Location updates can be delayed.
